title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Bases in Yaroun and Syrian Army Infrastructure: A Response to Attacks on Israeli Territory”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF attacked Hezbollah terrorist infrastructures in the Yaroun village area; a fighter jet attacked a Syrian army infrastructure overnight in response to launches towards Israeli territory.

Air Force fighter jets recently attacked terrorist infrastructures where Hezbollah terrorists were operating in the Yaroun village area in Lebanon.

Overnight, the IDF attacked a military infrastructure of the Syrian army in response to launches yesterday (Monday) towards Israeli territory.

In addition, two launches from Lebanese territory towards Shlomi were identified a short while ago.

Attached is documentation of the attack on the Hezbollah terrorist organization’s infrastructures in Lebanon: https://bit.ly/41KcJLH
